just cut along that big thick center rib
and this as you might be able to see is
Savoye cabbage which is a little crinkly
err and much more flavorful than

cabbage is cheap
we're just wilting these vegetables a

the rest of the garlic a big healthy

salt and pepper to give that about a

use raw rice and the reason you don't
want to over stuff is that everything is

to absorb some of that sauce the rice is
gonna cook all the way through the

the lamb is gonna cook also so it's
